title: Asst Athletic Director of Marketing and New Media - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Asst Athletic Director of Marketing and New Media College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: Develops, executes and evaluates marketing plans and strategies for these two sports. Manages social media relative to all marketing aspects for Athletic Dept and assists with special marketing...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
